overlay.title: Dear wedding guests,
overlay.body:
For almost 15 years, we have been playing a game with Lennart that we call “Knallo-Cup” among friends (long story…). The idea of the game is to compete one-on-one or in groups, complete challenges, and score points for your respective team. A points and dice system, including a game board, already exists.
What’s missing? The games themselves – and that’s where we need you! Any idea is welcome, whether it’s balancing bottles on your forehead, reciting the alphabet backwards, or – with the utmost seriousness – skillfully sending a paper airplane into your opponent’s open fly. Anything fun and creative has a place on the game cards.

So grab a card, give your game idea a name, describe the challenge, and at the same time send greetings to the bride and groom, who will receive a unique, interactive gift from the entire wedding party.

Best regards,
Leander and Lukas
